column1: The Purple Pig////(++) Milk braised pork shoulder with mashed potatoes + puffed farro ($19): This was a fascinating dish with the pork so tender and mashed potatoes so creamy
column2: it is of molten consistency that melts in your mouth. It is rather indulgent but not too unbearably rich
column3: because they creatively use pork shoulder infused with milk rather than fatty pork belly. Intriguingly
column4: the only contrast is the topping of crispy puffed farro.
